trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref> class.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Het element dat is gekoppeld met dit automation peer.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> that holds the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De automation peer die is gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"> </xref> waarin zich de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Deze methode wordt aangeroepen door <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> opsommingswaarde.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Een value-opsomming die het patroon van het besturingselement.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , , or value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Een object dat het patroon controle ondersteunt als patternInterface is de , , , of waarde; anders .

trans-unit.source: Hides all controls that are in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verbergt alle besturingselementen die in de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dit lid is een expliciete interface lid-implementatie.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Het kan worden gebruikt alleen wanneer de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>exemplaar is geconverteerd naar een <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.target: Met deze eigenschap wordt de status, of is samengevouwen, van het besturingselement dat is gekoppeld aan dit <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.target: Het kan worden gebruikt alleen wanneer de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>exemplaar is geconverteerd naar een <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Schuift de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref> in het zichtbare gebied van de container.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dit lid is een expliciete interface lid-implementatie.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
